com.dhemery.configuring
Interface Configuration

All Known Implementing Classes:
MapBackedConfiguration, TrimmingConfiguration
public interface Configuration

A set of configuration options.

Method Summary
 Map<String,String> asMap()
          Return a map of this configuration's options.
 Properties asProperties()
          Return a properties list with this configuration's options.
 void define(String name, String value)
          Define an option by supplying a value.
 Boolean defines(String name)
          Indicate whether this configuration defines the named option.
 void merge(Configuration other)
          Merge a set of options from another configuration into this configuration.
 void merge(Map<String,String> map)
          Merge a set of options from a map into this configuration.
 void merge(Properties properties)
          Merge a set of options from a property list into this configuration.
 Set<String> names()
          Return the names of the configuration's defined options.
 String option(String name)
          Return the value of an option.
 String option(String name, String defaultValue)
          Return the value of an option, or the given default value if the configuration does not define the option.
 String option(String name, Supplier<String> supplier)
          Return the value of an option, or the value obtained from a supplier if the configuration does not define the option.
 String requiredOption(String name)
          Return the value of a required option.
 

Method Detail

asMap

Map<String,String> asMap()
Return a map of this configuration's options.

asProperties

Properties asProperties()
Return a properties list with this configuration's options.

define

void define(String name,
            String value)
Define an option by supplying a value. If the configuration already defines the option the given value replaces the old one.

defines

Boolean defines(String name)
Indicate whether this configuration defines the named option.

merge

void merge(Configuration other)
Merge a set of options from another configuration into this configuration.

merge

void merge(Map<String,String> map)
Merge a set of options from a map into this configuration.

merge

void merge(Properties properties)
Merge a set of options from a property list into this configuration.

names

Set<String> names()
Return the names of the configuration's defined options.

option

String option(String name)
Return the value of an option.

Parameters:
name - the name of an option
Returns:
the value of the option, or null if the configuration does not define the option

option

String option(String name,
              String defaultValue)
Return the value of an option, or the given default value if the configuration does not define the option. This method does not add the default value to the configuration. If the option is undefined when this method is called, it remains undefined when the method returns.

Parameters:
name - the name of an option
defaultValue - the value to return if the configuration does not define the option
Returns:
the value of the option, or defaultValue if the configuration does not define the option

option

String option(String name,
              Supplier<String> supplier)
Return the value of an option, or the value obtained from a supplier if the configuration does not define the option. This method does not add the supplied value to the configuration. If the option is undefined when this method is called, it remains undefined when the method returns.

Parameters:
name - the name of an option
supplier - a supplier that supplies a value if the configuration does not define the option
Returns:
the value of the option, or the value supplied by supplier if the configuration does not define the option

requiredOption

String requiredOption(String name)
Return the value of a required option.

Parameters:
name - the name of an option
Returns:
the value of the option
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if this configuration does not define the option
